about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of an unfortunate delivery driver embarking on his first day on the job, tasked with delivering coffins in The Last Delivery, a spine-chilling survival horror experience. What begins as a seemingly routine assignment takes a horrifying turn when your very first stop leads you to an eerie, isolated mansion far from the safety of the city.

The moment you cross the mansion's threshold, the door slams shut behind you, trapping you inside with a vengeful, malevolent entity that hungers for your soul. With no escape in sight, your only hope lies in uncovering the mansion’s sinister secrets. To survive, you’ll need to traverse its shadowy corridors, solve challenging and spine-tingling puzzles, and recover the ghost’s scattered remains to bring peace to its restless spirit.

Features:

  • Exploration and Discovery: Navigate the ominous mansion’s maze-like structure, uncover hidden rooms, and explore every shadowy corner to piece together the mystery behind its dark past.

  • Item Interaction: Pick up and interact with various items, tools, and cryptic clues to assist you in your quest to defeat the evil spirit and escape the mansion. Some objects may hold the key to unlocking sealed doors or solving intricate puzzles.

  • Key Hunts and Room Access: Search for hidden keys and figure out creative ways to access locked rooms. Each new area brings fresh challenges, dangers, and vital information.

  • Safe Rooms: Identify and retreat to safe rooms scattered throughout the mansion to hide from the relentless, malevolent entity. These spaces offer brief moments of respite as you strategize your next move.

  • Terrifying Encounters: The demonic forces lurking in the mansion are relentless, growing more dangerous with every step you take. Stay vigilant, as they can strike when you least expect it.

Can you outwit the dark forces, unravel the mansion’s horrific history, and make your escape? Or will this first delivery become your last?

name: Coffin Delivery

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i3 / Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1660 or AMD
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Trapped in a haunted mansion on your first day delivering coffins, you must uncover its dark secrets to survive. Explore eerie halls and evade a stalking demonic presence as you race to gather the ghost's remains and find a way out alive.
